com.mariten.kanatools

Class KanaConverter

  • Object
    • KanaConverter

  • public class KanaConverter
extends Object
    Easy back-and-forth conversion of kana, hankaku, zenkaku, and other characters used in Japanese text.

    For example code, see the class details page

    Perform multiple conversions on Kana and Roma-ji text with just a single static function call

    • Specify one or more conversion operations using flag-style integer constants representing each available type of convesion
    • Call the convertKana function once on an input string it will quickly handle each conversion in a single run
    • Designed with speed in mind
    • Optionally able to specify characters to be excluded from conversion
    • Uses UTF-8
    • Inspired by mb_convert_kana, a native PHP function that similarly handles multi-method Japanese text conversions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int OP_HAN_ASCII_TO_ZEN_ASCII
      Conversion Op Flag: Standard-width (hankaku) ASCII to double-width (zenkaku).
      static int OP_HAN_KATA_TO_ZEN_HIRA
      Conversion Op Flag: Half-width (hankaku) katakana to full-width (zenkaku) hiragana.
      static int OP_HAN_KATA_TO_ZEN_KATA
      Conversion Op Flag: Half-width (hankaku) katakana to full-width (zenkaku).
      static int OP_HAN_LETTER_TO_ZEN_LETTER
      Conversion Op Flag: Standard-width (hankaku) alphabetic letters to double-width (zenkaku).
      static int OP_HAN_NUMBER_TO_ZEN_NUMBER
      Conversion Op Flag: Standard-width (hankaku) numbers to double-width (zenkaku).
      static int OP_HAN_SPACE_TO_ZEN_SPACE
      Conversion Op Flag: Standard-width (hankaku) spaces to double-width (zenkaku).
      static int OP_KEEP_DIACRITIC_MARKS_APART
      Conversion Op Flag: Keep hankaku katakana diacritic marks separate.
      static int OP_ZEN_ASCII_TO_HAN_ASCII
      Conversion Op Flag: Double-width (zenkaku) ASCII characters to standard-width (hankaku).
      static int OP_ZEN_HIRA_TO_HAN_KATA
      Conversion Op Flag: Full-width (zenkaku) hirgana to half-width (hankaku) katakana.
      static int OP_ZEN_HIRA_TO_ZEN_KATA
      Conversion Op Flag: Full-width (zenkaku) hiragana to full-width (hankaku) katakana.
      static int OP_ZEN_KATA_TO_HAN_KATA
      Conversion Op Flag: Full-width (zenkaku) katakana to half-width (hankaku).
      static int OP_ZEN_KATA_TO_ZEN_HIRA
      Conversion Op Flag: Full-width (zenkaku) katakana to full-width (zenkaku) hiragana.
      static int OP_ZEN_LETTER_TO_HAN_LETTER

      Converts a string containing kana or other characters used in Japanese text input according to one or more requested conversion methods, and permits exclusion of certain characters.

    • Method Detail

      • convertKana

        public static String convertKana(String original_string,
                                 int conversion_ops)
        Converts a string containing kana or other characters used in Japanese text input according to one or more requested conversion methods.
        Parameters:
        original_string - UTF-8 string to convert
        conversion_ops - Flag-based integer indicating which type of conversion operations to perform by setting one or more "KanaConverter.OP_" constants; details on this parameter can be found here
        Returns:
        UTF-8 string with all requested conversions applied
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • convertKana

        public static String convertKana(String original_string,
                                 int conversion_ops,
                                 String chars_to_ignore)
        Converts a string containing kana or other characters used in Japanese text input according to one or more requested conversion methods, and permits exclusion of certain characters.
        Parameters:
        original_string - UTF-8 string to convert
        conversion_ops - Flag-based integer indicating which type of conversion operations to perform by setting one or more "KanaConverter.OP_" constants; details on this parameter can be found here
        chars_to_ignore - No characters in this string will be converted even if present in "original_string"
        Returns:
        UTF-8 string with all requested conversions applied
        Since:
        1.1.0
